UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Effect of size and N-terminal residue characteristics on bacterial cell penetration and antibacterial activity of the proline-rich peptide Bac7.
Literature.Author: Guida F, Benincasa M, Zahariev S, Scocchi M, Berti F, Gennaro R, Tossi A

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=4µM),Escherichia coli BW25113(MIC=4µM),Escherichia coli BW25113 del-waaG(MIC=1µM),Escherichia coli BW25113 del-sbmA(MIC=8µM)
